Uses of Package
com.soa.auz

  • Packages that use com.soa.auz 
    Package Description
    com.soa.auth.callback  
    com.soa.auz  
    com.soa.security.spi  
  • Classes in com.soa.auz used by com.soa.auth.callback 
    Class and Description
    IResource
    This is the interface to represent a resource in service manager.
  • Classes in com.soa.auz used by com.soa.auz 
    Class and Description
    IAuthorizationAuthority
    This is the client interface for authorization.
    IAuthorizationToken
    This is the interface to represent arbitrary authorization result, the result contains not only whether the access is allowed or denied, but also a set of credentials that provides additional information about the authorization context or constraint.
    IResource
    This is the interface to represent a resource in service manager.
    NamedResource
    This class represents a resource with only resource name and optionally the domain that manages the resources.
  • Classes in com.soa.auz used by com.soa.security.spi 
    Class and Description
    IAuthorizationAuthority
    This is the client interface for authorization.
